trans-unit.source: Dynamically performs hit testing on a <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 動態執行點擊測試<xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The IncrementalHitTester dynamically determines whether the user "hits" a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫 Endhittesting 以動態方式決定是否使用者 「 叫用 「 <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>

trans-unit.source: This class enables you to provide immediate feedback to the user in situations such as selecting and erasing ink.
trans-unit.target: 此類別可讓您立即回應提供給使用者的情況，例如選取和清除筆墨。

trans-unit.source: There are two classes that inherit from IncrementalHitTester: - The <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalLassoHitTester> hit tests strokes by determining whether a lasso path surrounds it.
trans-unit.target: 有兩種類別繼承自呼叫 Endhittesting:-<xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalLassoHitTester>叫用測試筆劃判斷是否套索路徑括住它。</xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalLassoHitTester>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester> hit tests strokes by determining where an eraser path intersects it.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester>叫用測試筆劃判斷橡皮擦路徑交集它。</xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists where to learn how to manage digital ink on a custom control.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出了解如何管理自訂控制項上的數位筆跡的位置。

trans-unit.source: |To do this…|See this article| |-----------------|----------------------| |Create a control that collects digital ink|[Creating an Ink Input Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)| |Create a control that enables the user to select ink|[How to: Select Ink from a Custom Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)| |Create a control that enables the user to point-erase ink|[How to: Erase Ink on a Custom Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)| ## XAML Text Usage This class is not typically used in XAML.
trans-unit.target: |若要這樣做...|請參閱本文章 | |-----------------|----------------------| |建立控制項，以收集數位筆跡 |[建立筆跡輸入控制項](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)| |建立控制項，可讓使用者選取的筆墨 |[How to︰ 自訂控制項從選取的筆墨](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)| |建立控制項，讓使用者可以點選清除筆墨 |[How to︰ 自訂控制項上清除的筆墨](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)| # # 在 XAML 中通常不使用 XAML 文字使用此類別。

trans-unit.source: Adds a <xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref> to the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref> to add to the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref> to add to the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Adds points to the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester"></xref>.
An array of type <xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref> to add to the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester"></xref>.
Adds the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref> objects to the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester"></xref>.
A collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref> objects to add to the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester"></xref>.
Adds points to the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester"></xref>.
The points to add
Releases resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester"></xref>.
Call the EndHitTesting method when the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester> finishes hit testing.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫 EndHitTesting 方法時<xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester>完成點擊測試。</xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester>

trans-unit.source: Gets whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester"></xref> is hit testing.
The IsValid returns `true` until <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester.EndHitTesting%2A> is called.
Then it returns `false`.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester"></xref> is hit testing; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester"></xref>叫用測試; 否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
